By appealing to the authority and sheer number of tags, the tweets attempt to gain support and compliance without addressing the actual reasons or consequences of such actions.

Appeal to Tradition Wisdom: This fallacy is present in tweets that emphasize the need to close the sky over Ukraine based on the belief that it is the right course of action due to the traditional values or practices of the international community.
